location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 1865/47 'Sir Reginald Stradling: visit to Bahrain en route for Australia and New Zealand'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a letter and draft telegram between the Secretary of the Ministry of Works and the Foreign Office, regarding the arrangement of a visit to Bahrain by Chief Scientific Adviser to the Ministry of Works, Reginald Stradling, while en route to Australia and New Zealand for a mission.
